content: Finding New Allies Yes, here I am sharing something from John McCain — which shows you how bad things have gotten. But he’s right, “We must take our own side in this fight.” Maybe Senator McCain’s call to action will wake some of his republican colleagues out of their self-serving stupor of complicity. If he can do that, he has my support. Notice that he didn’t mention Trump by name. He didn’t have to — the threat is well-understood. There’s some comfort in that clarity.
